project_description: A simple Flutter application using the Cubit pattern for state management. The app has two screens: a login screen with email and password fields, and a home screen with a logout button.
architecture_overview: The app follows a modular structure with separate folders for screens, cubits, models, and widgets. The Cubit pattern is used for state management, ensuring a clear separation of concerns.

files.name: lib/main.dart
files.description: Entry point of the application. Initializes and provides all the necessary Cubits using BlocProvider.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the Flutter application.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the main widget of the application.

files.name: lib/cubits/auth_cubit.dart
files.description: Defines the AuthCubit and its states for managing authentication state.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Attempts to log in the user with the provided email and password.

files.name: lib/models/user_model.dart

widgets.name: LoginScreen
widgets.description: Screen for user login with email and password fields.

widgets.name: HomeScreen
widgets.description: Home screen with a logout button.

widgets.name: LoginForm
widgets.description: Form widget for login with email and password fields.

widgets.name: LogoutButton
widgets.description: Button widget for logging out the user.

cubits.name: AuthCubit
cubits.description: Manages the authentication state of the application.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Attempts to log in the user with the provided email and password.

models.name: User
models.description: Represents a user with an email and password.

dependencies.name: flutter
dependencies.purpose: Flutter framework for building the application.

dependencies.name: flutter_bloc
dependencies.purpose: State management using the Cubit pattern.

sequence_diagram:
@startuml
actor User
User -> LoginScreen: open()
LoginScreen -> AuthCubit: login(email, password)
AuthCubit -> AuthState: Authenticated
LoginScreen -> HomeScreen: navigate()
HomeScreen -> AuthCubit: logout()
AuthCubit -> AuthState: Unauthenticated
HomeScreen -> LoginScreen: navigate()
@enduml
state_management_flow: State management is handled using the Cubit pattern. The AuthCubit manages the authentication state and provides methods to login and logout. The state flows from the AuthCubit to the respective widgets, ensuring a clear separation of concerns.
navigation_flow: The app starts at the LoginScreen. Upon successful login, the app navigates to the HomeScreen. The HomeScreen has a logout button that, when pressed, logs out the user and navigates back to the LoginScreen.

pubspec_yaml.name: simple_cubit_app
pubspec_yaml.description: A simple Flutter application using the Cubit pattern for state management.
